title: Mobile responsive AppShell, fully hidden mobile sidebar, and Life Lessons filter/header overlay fix + rename

requirements.summary: Improve mobile responsiveness across the AppShell layout (sidebar + main content) to prevent overflow, improve spacing, and ensure comfortable touch interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: On screens <= 768px wide, no horizontal scrolling is required on core pages due to layout overflow.
Tap targets for navigation controls (menu button, nav icons/links) meet a minimum 44x44px interactive area (consistent with existing mobile touch-target intent in CSS).
The main content area remains scrollable and usable on mobile; header + navigation do not block access to page content.

file_operations.description: Refine AppShell responsive layout so the sidebar/mobile overlay behavior cannot cause horizontal overflow and the main content always uses the full viewport width on small screens; ensure the main scroll container remains usable. Use existing shadcn-ui Button/ScrollArea composition only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add/adjust global mobile-safe layout safeguards (e.g., preventing unintended horizontal overflow at the root/layout level) while keeping the existing 44x44 mobile touch-target intent intact.

requirements.summary: Implement a fully hideable (off-canvas) sidebar mode on mobile with open/close controls and non-obscuring behavior, while preserving the current desktop expanded vs icon-collapsed behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On screens <= 768px wide, the sidebar can be fully hidden (0 width or off-canvas) such that the main content uses the full viewport width.
A menu button is available to open the sidebar when it is hidden, and a clear action exists to close it again.
Opening the sidebar on mobile does not cause content to be permanently obscured without an obvious close/dismiss interaction.
On larger screens, current behavior (expanded vs icon-collapsed sidebar) remains functional.

file_operations.description: Add a small hook that tracks whether the viewport is currently mobile-sized (<=768px) to drive AppShell behavior without duplicating media-query logic in multiple places.

Update sidebar state logic and layout to support a true off-canvas mobile sidebar (fully hidden when closed), including: a visible menu button when hidden, an overlay/backdrop and click-to-dismiss behavior when open, and preservation of existing desktop expanded vs icon-collapsed behavior. Use existing shadcn-ui Button/ScrollArea/DropdownMenu composition only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Rework the Life Lessons page header/filter layout so category and favorites filters live at the top without overlaying or blocking the video list while scrolling.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Life Lessons page, the filter controls (favorites + category buttons) are positioned at the top and do not obscure the video grid/list while scrolling.
The first row of videos is fully visible and not hidden behind any sticky filter/header elements.
No filter/menu element overlaps the video cards on mobile (verified at typical iPhone viewport widths).

file_operations.description: Replace the current multi-sticky header/filter arrangement with a top-of-screen filter area that does not overlap the video grid on mobile (e.g., consolidate into a single sticky header region or make filters non-sticky), ensuring the video list scrolls beneath without being covered. Use existing shadcn-ui Input/Button/Badge composition only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
If needed, add a small, page-safe styling safeguard to ensure sticky elements used by the Life Lessons page do not overlap subsequent content on mobile (avoid changes that impact unrelated pages).

requirements.summary: Rename the user-facing 'Life Lessons' label across the UI (page title and sidebar label) while keeping the route path '/mental-performance/life-lessons' unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The Life Lessons page header no longer displays the old label text.
The sidebar navigation label for the Life Lessons route reflects the new name.
The URL path for the page remains '/mental-performance/life-lessons' and navigation to that route continues to work.

file_operations.description: Create a single exported constant for the Life Lessons display name (set to the user-requested new name) so the label is consistent across the UI while keeping the route path unchanged.

Update the sidebar navigation item label for '/mental-performance/life-lessons' to use the centralized display-name constant (do not change the route path). Use existing shadcn-ui Button composition only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update the page header title text to use the centralized display-name constant (do not change the route path). Use existing shadcn-ui composition only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
